      • Solver

        public Solver()

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public void solve()

      • backtrack

        public void backtrack()

      • sanityCheck

        public boolean sanityCheck()
        Loops through the grid and sees if any cells are empty and have a size of 0.
        Returns:
        True if every cell passes the sanity check.

      • solved

        public boolean solved()
        A grid is solved if every cell has a value.
        Returns:
        True if every cell is filled in.

      • fillEasyCells

        public boolean fillEasyCells()
        Calls reducePossiblities and then fills in each cell with only one possible value. Cells are found via firstDetermined.
        Returns:
        True if a cell was filled in.

      • guess

        public void guess()
        Called when there are no more easy cells to fill in. Takes the first undetermined cell and has it guess a value for itself.

      • addMove

        public void addMove(boolean guess,
           int value,
           int loc)
        Creates a new move and pushes it onto the stack.
        Parameters:
        guess - True if the value was guessed.
        value - Value to give the cell.
        loc - Cell's location.

      • firstUndetermined

        public Cell firstUndetermined()
        Searches through the grid and looks for the first empty cell.
        Returns:
        The first empty cell.

      • firstDetermined

        public Cell firstDetermined()
        Searches through the grid and looks for the first empty cell with only 1 possibility.
        Returns:
        The first empty cell with size equal to 1.

      • easyReduce

        public void easyReduce()
        Removes all of the easy possibilities from cells in the grid.

      • reducePossibilites

        public boolean reducePossibilites()
        Returns:
        true if a possibility was changed. false if nothing changed.

      • validGrid

        public boolean validGrid()
        Looks at each group in groups and calls Group.valid()
        Returns:
        true if every group in this grid is valid. False if at least one is not.

      • loadGrid

        public void loadGrid(java.lang.String file,
            int size)
        Reads in a grid from a file. When reading, only accepts values between 1 and N as valid cell entries.
        Parameters:
        file - Path to file to read.
        size - Dimension of the grid. Refers to the total number of cells per row or column.

      • undoMove

        public void undoMove(Move m)
        Parses a move and then calls the corresponding cell's removeGuess() method.
        Parameters:
        m - Move to undo.

      • makeGrid

        public void makeGrid()

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints out the cell values in a grid.
